modName: Hearthfire Fortifications and hot tubs and pools
summary:
This mod is a mod merge of Draco 1122's hearth fire fortifications and SA 547 hearth fire hot tubs and pools

This is a six asset merge into one mod merge

With this merge in place you wall have fortification at each of the hearth fire building sites you can build any configuration hearth fire home without obstruction or
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Thank You, for all the endorsements !!!   [/size][size=5]Wow [/size][size=3]   The Mod authors are appreciative it as well !!! Maybe we get on the Front Page!

Every hard working Dovahkiin deserves a place  to rest and recover from a day out saving Tamriel [/size][size=3]one hold at a time

Until Draco1122 created the Hearthfire Forts there were always something to have to deal with ..Giants Bandits and other stuff.

This mod is a mod merge of Draco 1122's Hearthfire fortifications and SA 547 Hearthfire hot tubs and pools.
This is a six asset merge into one mod merge
With this merge in place you will have fortifications at each of the Hearthfire building sites you can build any configuration hearth fire home without obstruction or clearance issues.

The hot tub assets are created by SA547 and they are beautifully done standalone units that add to the hearthfire experience.

Draco 1122 created these fortifications in 2015 and has continued to develop the mod and support it

SA547 remains an active modder and has some outstanding mods that have excellent detail and fantastic hot tubs and pools that support hearthfire homes.

[youtube]5XqM7uKzXsg[/youtube]


[b]Requirements: Hearthfire

These are the assets being combined in the merge[/b]

Dracos Hearthfire Homes Exterior Upgrades Windstad Lakeview Heljarchen

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61979/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61979/?[/url]

Lakeview Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire by sa547 with TMPhoenix

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28515/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28515/?[/url]

Windstad Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire by sa547      *TESA Skyrim Resource Kit

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35359/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35359/?[/url]

Heljarchen Pool and Hot Bath for Hearthfire by sa547

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36776/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36776/?[/url]

Additional Credits:The round water mesh belongs to TESA  (Windstad Pool and Hot Bath)

[url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1330-the-tesa-skyrim-resource-kit-project/]http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1330-the-tesa-skyrim-resource-kit-project/[/url]

[/size]

[size=4]Recommended mods:
Hearthfire Extended to get the most from your Hearthfire experience and the ultimate Hearthfire home.

Hearthfire Extended by Kinaga

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66783/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66783/?[/url]

Windstad Mine by Skvindt

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57879/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57879/?[/url]

Heljarchen Farm by Skvindt

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50992/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50992/?[/url]



Thank you again Draco1122 and SA547


Thank you

Reynard 131[/size]
